education.degree:
Bachelor of Science 
 Mathematics and Computing Science Joint Major

description: Processed delivery invoices from salesman and entered them manually into an IBM System i (AS/400).
Verified order accuracy by ensuring changes on order forms are clearly communicated between co-workers and updated onto the system in a timely manner.
Trained new employees when supervisor is unavailable.
Assisted with in-shop repairs various home appliances (ie. TVs, microwaves, audio systems).
Responded to in-home requests for electronic appliance installations in conjunction with the Technician-in-Charge.
Communicated with the receptionist to ensure parts for various repairs are stocked and available.
Worked with customers to find the corresponding components for their projects.
Provided customers with advice on their projects and responded to questions they may have regarding their schematics.
Maintained an adequate supply of various components on store shelves.

volunteering.location: Scouts Canada - 69th Knights of Kensington Scout Group
description: Leading and assisting youth of varying ages in Scouting activities such as camps and outings.
Providing leadership to develop and ensure safe, high-quality programs in alignment with the Scouting Movement.
Establish and maintain positive relationships with parents, leaders, Partner/Sponsor, and the community at large.

volunteering.location: Eric Hamber Secondary School - Department of Bands
description: Coordinated with Nicholas Francis (Director of Bands) to complete various tasks such as completing paperwork and organizing sheet music to complete a full Music Score.
Ensured instruments in the school inventory are put away properly and made minor repairs if anything was damaged.
Conducted workshops with the Clarinet Section to work through sections of a music piece, as well as help them improve their playing skills.
